title: Average regular season home attendance of the Cleveland Browns 2008 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, containing a total of 12 data points.
In general Average attendance has fallen over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Average attendance, of value 72778.0 was reached at Year 2008
Minimum Average attendance about 63882.0 was reached at Year 2017
